content.question: What are all values of <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for which <math alttext="ln open parentheses x cubed close parentheses minus ln x equals 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi>ln</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mpadded></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="x equals negative 2"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals 2"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals negative e squared"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals e squared"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals e to the power of 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
